menus.main_menu:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
View & Create

(1) Yarn
(2) Hooks
(3) Stitch Types
(4) Stitches
(5) Gauge Square
(6) Rows
(7) Patterns

Enter #
menus.yarn_menu:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Your Yarn

{list_yarns}

Enter # of yarn for more info
Enter ‘add’ to add new yarn
Enter ‘q’ to go back to inventory
menus.stitch_type_menu:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Stitch Types

{stitch_types}

Enter # of stitch type for more info
Enter ‘q’ to go back to inventory
menus.stitch_menu:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Stitches

{stitch_list}
Enter # of stitch for views
Enter ‘add’ to add a new stitch
Enter ‘q’ to go back to inventory
menus.select_yarn:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
{name} - Change Yarn 

{yarn_list}

Enter # to change yarn
Enter ‘q’ to go back
menus.select_stitch_type:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
{name} - Change Stitch Type

{stitch_type_list}

Enter # to change stitch type
Enter ‘q’ to go back
menus.select_hook:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
{name} -  Change Hook Size (mm)

Enter a float to change hook size
Enter ‘q’ to go back
menus.row_menu:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Rows

{row_list}
Enter # for more info
Enter 'add' to create a new row
Enter ‘q’ to go back
menus.select_row_stitches:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Select Stitches for your Row

All Stitches:
{stitch_list}
Enter 'q' to go back
Enter # of stitch
(multiple stitches should be separated by a comma)
menus.add_gaugesq:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Generate a 4x4in Gauge Square

{stitch_list}
Enter # of stitch to build a 4x4in square
Enter ‘add’ to add a new stitch
Enter ‘q’ to go back to inventory
menus.pattern_menu:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Patterns

{pattern_list}
Enter # of Pattern for more info
Enter ’add’ to add a new Pattern
Enter ‘q’ to go back to inventory
menus.select_pattern_rows:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Select Pattern Rows

{list_rows}

Enter # to get row info
Enter at least 2 rows (comma delimited) to build
Enter ‘q’ to go back
menus.add_pattern:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Add Pattern - {name}

Available Rows:
{row_list}
Enter pattern to generate & save
Enter 'help' for instructions
Enter 'quit' to go back
menus.hook_list:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Recent Hooks:

{hook_list}
Enter ‘q’ to go back to inventory
